title: Sushi & Me classes operate on first-come, first-serve basis
statement: Benihana Sushi & Me classes are filled on a first-come, first-serve basis and require payment to hold a place.

citations.quote: No, the Benihana Sushi & Me classes are filled on a first-come, first-serve basis and in order for us to hold a place for your party, we must receive your payment.
